Protocols/ApiAuthenticationInterface.htm.name: headers
Protocols/ApiAuthenticationInterface.htm.abstract: The default headers used for API authentication.

Protocols/ApiAuthenticationInterface.htm.name: generateHeaders(forMethod:forBody:withJwt:)
Protocols/ApiAuthenticationInterface.htm.abstract: Generates the headers required to authenticate with the API for a specific request.

Protocols/ApiAuthenticationInterface.htm.name: ApiAuthenticationInterface
Protocols/ApiAuthenticationInterface.htm.abstract: A protocol that defines the requirements for API authentication mechanisms.

Protocols/EndpointInterface.html.name: EndpointInterface
Protocols/EndpointInterface.html.abstract: A protocol that defines the requirements for building and manipulating API endpoint URLs.

Protocols.html#/s:11SwiftlyRest19StringR.name: StringRepresentable
Protocols.html#/s:11SwiftlyRest19StringR.abstract: A protocol that defines a type that can be represented as a string.

Enums/HTTPMethod.html#/s:11SwiftlyRest10.name: get
Enums/HTTPMethod.html#/s:11SwiftlyRest10.abstract: HTTP GET method, used to retrieve data from the server.

Enums/HTTPMethod.html#/s:11SwiftlyRest10.name: post
Enums/HTTPMethod.html#/s:11SwiftlyRest10.abstract: HTTP POST method, used to send new data to the server.

Enums/HTTPMethod.html#/s:11SwiftlyRest10.name: put
Enums/HTTPMethod.html#/s:11SwiftlyRest10.abstract: HTTP PUT method, used to update existing data on the server.

Enums/HTTPMethod.html#/s:11SwiftlyRest10.name: patch
Enums/HTTPMethod.html#/s:11SwiftlyRest10.abstract: HTTP PATCH method, used to partially update data on the server.

Enums/HTTPMethod.html#/s:11SwiftlyRest10.name: delete
Enums/HTTPMethod.html#/s:11SwiftlyRest10.abstract: HTTP DELETE method, used to remove data from the server.

Enums/SwiftlyRestError.html#/s:11Swiftly.name: noResponse
Enums/SwiftlyRestError.html#/s:11Swiftly.abstract: No response was received from the server.

Enums/SwiftlyRestError.html#/s:11Swiftly.name: badRequest(message:)
Enums/SwiftlyRestError.html#/s:11Swiftly.abstract: The server returned a bad request (400) with an optional message.

Enums/SwiftlyRestError.html#/s:11Swiftly.name: badGateway
Enums/SwiftlyRestError.html#/s:11Swiftly.abstract: The server returned a bad gateway error (502).

Enums/SwiftlyRestError.html#/s:11Swiftly.name: unexpectedResponseFormat
Enums/SwiftlyRestError.html#/s:11Swiftly.abstract: The response format was unexpected or could not be parsed.

Enums/SwiftlyRestError.html#/s:11Swiftly.name: unknown(code:message:)
Enums/SwiftlyRestError.html#/s:11Swiftly.abstract: An unknown error occurred, with code and message.

Enums/SwiftlyRestError.html#/s:11Swiftly.name: badRequestBody
Enums/SwiftlyRestError.html#/s:11Swiftly.abstract: The request body was invalid or could not be encoded.

Enums/SwiftlyRestError.html.name: SwiftlyRestError
Enums/SwiftlyRestError.html.abstract: Represents errors that can occur when making REST API requests using SwiftlyRest.

Enums/HTTPMethod.html.name: HTTPMethod
Enums/HTTPMethod.html.abstract: Represents the HTTP methods used in REST API requests.

Enums/RetryableCodes.html.name: RetryableCodes
Enums/RetryableCodes.html.abstract: Represents HTTP status codes that are considered retryable for REST API requests.

Classes/SwiftlyRest.html#/s:11SwiftlyRes.abstract: Configures the base URL to be used

Classes/SwiftlyRest.html#/s:11SwiftlyRes.name: configureApiAuth(_:)
Classes/SwiftlyRest.html#/s:11SwiftlyRes.abstract: Configures the API Auth with the ApiAuthenticationInterface protocol

Classes/SwiftlyRest.html#/s:11SwiftlyRes.name: setJwtToken(_:)
Classes/SwiftlyRest.html#/s:11SwiftlyRes.abstract: Sets the JWT token for the requests

Classes/SwiftlyRest.html#/s:11SwiftlyRes.name: storeJwtOnKeychain(jwt:on:)
Classes/SwiftlyRest.html#/s:11SwiftlyRes.abstract: Stored the active jwt token on the platform if a jwt is passed that token will be stored instead

Classes/SwiftlyRest.html#/s:11SwiftlyRes.name: loadJwtFromKeychain(from:)
Classes/SwiftlyRest.html#/s:11SwiftlyRes.abstract: Loads the JWT stored in the keychain onto the JWT variable to use in the requests

Classes/Endpoint.html#/s:11SwiftlyRest8E.abstract: Initializes the Endpoint with an optional URL.
